member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_CONTENT_PROTECTION_CAPS
member.summary: Describes the content-protection capabilities of a graphics driver.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_CONTENT_PROTECTION_CAPS.Caps
member.summary: A bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_CONTENT_PROTECTION_CAPS.KeyExchangeTypeCount
member.summary: The number of cryptographic key-exchange types that are supported by the driver. To get the list of key-exchange types, call the method.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_CONTENT_PROTECTION_CAPS.BlockAlignmentSize
member.summary: The encryption block size, in bytes. The size of data to be encrypted must be a multiple of this value.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_CONTENT_PROTECTION_CAPS.ProtectedMemorySize
member.summary: The total amount of memory, in bytes, that can be used to hold protected surfaces.
